name: Wasteland Golf
description:
8/10/2016

UPDATE! Thanks to the good reception and the many positive "Let's Play" videos, we have decided to expand and improve our game. "Wasteland Golf" has evolved into "Time Golf Squad". We are fixing physics, adding mechanics, creating art, adding new levels/worlds, and telling a story with fun characters.

WASTELAND GOLF

Golf your way across the wasteland collecting pieces of your prize puzzle box while avoiding hazards that are more dangerous to you than your ball.

How to play:

Play with the mouse. Click and drag the ball to shoot or click and drag the ground to look around.
